A foam hand, also known as a foam finger, is a sports paraphernalia item worn 
on the hand to show support for a particular team. The most common version 
resembles an oversized hand with an extended index finger, and slits in their 
bases allow them to be worn over the hands. ... Originally created by Steve 
Chmelar in 1971, who constructed a giant hand...
